summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 57th Street, from 34th Avenue Northeast to the west margin of the alley between 31st Avenue Northeast and 33rd Avenue Northeast, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7781 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
